name: All-American Peach Pie Wonder
author: Anonymous
summary: Savor the sweetness of summer with this wonderful take on an all-American dish. With the calcium of eight ounces of milk in just two slices of Wonder Classic White Sandwich Bread, this pie is not only good, it's good for you too.
ingredients: 5 slices Wonder® Classic White Sandwich Bread, crusts removed
6 medium (blank)s fresh peaches, peeled, pitted, and sliced
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Cut each Wonder Bread slice into 4 or 5 strips
Spread the fruit in the baking pan and cover with a layer of bread strips
In a separate mixing bowl, beat together the butter, sugar, flour and egg
Gently spread over the fruit and bread
Bake 40 to 50 minutes, or until golden brown
